A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite the bad press I decided to keep an open mind and watch this movie.... Sometimes you shouldn't keep an open mind....\nThis is one of the worst films I have ever seen. The director apparently also wrote this incomprehensible mess of a story. I can only assume his career is now over? I'm familiar enough with the previous Star Wars movies to appreciate how much this completely fails to further the story. If you want to be made to feel depressed\, frustrated and embarrassed for the actors involved I highly recommend this movie.
